group_1.textLeft: ...So um, I brought the Flower Arrangement@Head.
We have a little bit more time until the@demonstration is scheduled...
So please enjoy the tea party with everyone else!

group_1.textRight: I didn’t know you knew flower arrangement!@You can do anything!

group_1.textLeft: Y-yeah! I really look up to you...
Eh?
Did I say that...
In some confusing, easily misunderstood way?!
You understand she'll demonstrate the flower@arrangement, right?

group_1.textRight: Oh, okay... But you're still amazing.

group_1.textLeft: (Which part...?)
(Uh... I don’t feel very comfortable being in the@spotlight.)

group_1.textRight: Hehe, you're popular with the younger ones,@Miss Nanase.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, not you too, President...
(...That aside, I was definitely right about time@progressing slowly.)
(It feels like I’ve been at this tea party for a long,@long time.)
(But looking at the clock, we've barely arrived@at the party's second half...)

group_1.narration: 【Exchange Meeting Schedule】@―Arrive (St. Liliana Academy Student Council)―@―Tea Party in the Student@Council Room (New School Building)―
【Exchange Meeting Schedule】@―Live Flower Show in the Flower Arrangement@Club Room (Old School Building)―@―Moon-Viewing in the Flower Arrangement@Club Room (Old School Building)―

group_1.textCenter: (That daydream where the old school building@collapsed...)
(If that were to happen in real life, the situation@would become quite serious.)
(Worst-case scenario, I'll stop them from@entering using brute force...)
(If only this elegant tea party could continue@on forever...)
(Until a while ago, I was stubbornly trying to go@into the old building...)
(And considering the slow flow of time...)
(Perhaps this strange "Will of the Universe"@that's been obstructing me...)
(Has actually been on my side this whole time...?)
(Assuming that such a thing even exists,@of course...)

group_1.textRight: Okay, ladies. Since it’s starting to get dark...
Why don’t we head to the old school building@early?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:301701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh, now!?
(What an awful surprise attack! It’s too soon,@Student President!)
No... No. Let’s wait a little longer!
Look, um...
But Kaharun... She still hasn’t arrived yet...

group_1.textRight: She got held up attending one of her father's@social events, apparently.
She's supposed to be here soon, though.@What's she waiting around for?

group_1.textLeft: (Saved by the bell!)

group_1.textRight: Oh, please excuse me. It's true that Miss Kaharu@hasn’t arrived.
I’m sorry, then let’s continue the tea party@as planned.

group_1.textLeft: Let’s do that. By all means, let’s do that.

group_1.textRight: She's even concerned about Kaharun, too!
[chara:304501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Big sis is super kind, after all.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, yeah!
